art-print.title: Standard Art Print Sizes:
art-print.heading: When choosing an art print, consider the size of the room and the wall space available. Make sure to measure the wall space before purchasing a print to ensure it will fit comfortably.

coffee-mug.title: Coffee Mug Size Guide:
coffee-mug.heading: When choosing a coffee mug, consider the size and capacity that works best for your needs. Additionally, consider the design and style of the mug to match your personal taste.

throw-pillow.title: Throw Pillow Size Guide:
throw-pillow.heading: When choosing throw pillows, consider the size and dimensions of your furniture and the space they will occupy. Make sure to measure your furniture before purchasing throw pillows to ensure a comfortable and aesthetically pleasing fit.

iphone-case.title: iPhone Case Size Guide:
iphone-case.heading: When choosing an iPhone case, make sure to select the size that corresponds with your specific device model. This will ensure a proper fit and protection for your device.

galaxy-case.title: Samsung Galaxy Case Size Guide:
galaxy-case.heading: When choosing a Samsung Galaxy case, make sure to select the size that corresponds with your specific device model. This will ensure a proper fit and protection for your device.

unisex-shirt.title: Unisex T-Shirt Size Guide:
unisex-shirt.heading: When choosing a unisex t-shirt, it is important to consider the size and fit to ensure a comfortable and flattering look.

help.headline: Hi There!
help.description: We are always happy to help and answer any questions you may have about your online purchases, returns, products or any other concerns you may have.
help.description_text_a_html: Before submitting your request, please check our FAQs, and Terms where your question may already be answered
help.description_text_b_html: You can either use our contact form or our email {{ email }} to send your request.
